title: Special Episode: The Debate over U.S. Fiscal Stimulus and Inflation
description: Michael Zezas, Head of U.S. Public Policy Research and Matthew Hornbach, Global Head of Macro Strategy, discuss the impact of stimulus and inflation on fixed income markets.
